author: David Pribulka
text: We are finalizing our township's Continuity of Operations Plan, and have located a suitable location to recover township operations if our facility is disabled and we need to evacuate for a period of time.  I am trying to put together a draft agreement with the owner of the proposed recovery site, and wondered if anybody has any tips or suggestions for inclusion that have benefited your organization.  Thanks!
title: Recovery Site Agreements
